amendment.description: Page 6, line 21, insert "(including the issuance of any permit that may be required from any Federal agency to construct the road)" after "under this Act".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
